cards.name: Super Potion
text: Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy attached to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Torment
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Eerie Voice
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spirit Scream
attacks.text: Put damage counters on both Active Pokémon until the remaining HP of each Pokémon is 10.

cards.name: Venusaur-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Poison Powder
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Jungle Hammer
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

cards.name: Xerneas-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Break Through
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: X Blast
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use X Blast during your next turn.

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Devastating Wind
attacks.text: Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 4 cards.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Mine
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, you may have your opponent shuffle his or her deck.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Night Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gather Energy
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Hocus Pinkus
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Fairy Transfer
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Fairy Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Hard Charm
text: Any damage done to the Pokémon this card is attached to by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Glare
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Second Bite
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Salon
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 different types of basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Bite Off
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Wild Barking
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Pickup
attacks.text: Put 2 Item cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Dig
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Cassius
text: Shuffle 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

cards.name: Evosoda
text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.

cards.name: Fairy Garden
text: Each Pokémon that has any Fairy Energy attached to it (both yours and your opponent's) has no Retreat Cost.

cards.name: Great Ball
text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Muscle Band
text: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Professor Sycamore
text: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.

cards.name: Professor's Letter
text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Red Card
text: Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 4 cards.

cards.name: Roller Skates
text: Flip a coin. If heads, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Shauna
text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.

attacks.name: Mach Punch
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

cards.name: M-Venusaur-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Crisis Vine
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

ability.name: Spiky Shield
ability.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Touchdown
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Conversion Powder
attacks.text: Choose either Asleep or Poisoned. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Colorful Wind
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each different type of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Supporter cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Charge Dash
attacks.text: You may do 20 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Clairvoyant Eye
attacks.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

attacks.name: Fire Tail Slap
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Mystical Fire
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Blaze Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Clamp Crush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy attached to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.text: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon and heal all damage from it.

attacks.name: Core Splash
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Psychic Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

ability.name: Water Shuriken
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Water Energy card from your hand. If you do, put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mist Slash
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Circle Circuit
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon.

cards.name: Emolga-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Energy Glide
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you attached Energy in this way, switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electron Crush
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Tricky Steps
attacks.text: You may move an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Continuous Tumble
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Random Peck
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Poison Ring
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Forest's Curse
ability.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't play any Item cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Tree Slam
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rock Tumble
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Dig Out
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fighting Energy card, attach it to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mad Mountain
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, discard the top card of your opponent's deck for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pummel
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Wake-Up Slap
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 60 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dynamic Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage and your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Filch
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Rip Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

ability.name: Upside-Down Evolution
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is Confused, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Confusion Wave
attacks.text: Both Active Pokémon are now Confused.

attacks.name: Puncture
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Mental Trash
attacks.text: Your opponent flips 4 coins. For each tails, he or she discards a card from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Distortion Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Oblivion Wing
attacks.text: Attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Darkness Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Metal Wallop
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Metal Wallop attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
